item.title: Evil Geniuses and Theta Labs launch AI chatbot based on esports mascot Meesh
item.description: Evil Geniuses, the well-known esports organization and brand, has launched its Meesh AI chatbot in a partnership with Theta Labs.

item.title: Google adds more AI tools to its Workspace productivity apps
item.description: Google expanded Gemini's features, adding the popular podcast-style feature Audio Overviews to the platform.

item.title: Former DeepSeeker and collaborators release new method for training reliable AI agents: RAGEN
item.description: RAGEN stands out not just as a technical contribution but as a conceptual step toward more autonomous, reasoning-capable AI agents.

item.title: Amazon’s SWE-PolyBench just exposed the dirty secret about your AI coding assistant
item.description: Amazon launches SWE-PolyBench, a groundbreaking multi-language benchmark that exposes critical limitations in AI coding assistants across Python, Java...

item.title: OpenAI makes ChatGPT’s image generation available as API
item.description: Enterprises can now make Studio Ghibli-inspired images through OpenAI's API.
